Quote: Farms and food production should be, I submit, at least as important as who pierced their navel in Hollywood this week. Please tell me I'm not the only one who believes this. Please. As a culture, we think we're well educated, but I'm not sure that what we've learned necessarily helps us survive.
Author: Joel Salatin,  Folks, This Ain't Normal: A Farmer's Advice for Happier Hens, Healthier People, and a Better World
